PHRASE.LANG: For a shiny show-off on the go, go with the phone that’s made of gold. For your Right Hand. [#Legal]
Si vous voulez en mettre plein la vue où que vous alliez, ce téléphone en or est fait pour vous. Pour droitiers. [#Legal]
Für einfaches Angeben zwischendurch ist das Handy aus Gold die erste Wahl. [#Legal]
Per metterti in mostra ovunque tu vada, scegli il telefono fatto d'oro. [#Legal]
Para presumir en cualquier parte, no salgas sin tu móvil de oro. Para tu mano derecha. [#Legal]
언제든지 부를 뽐낼 수 있습니다. 금으로 만든 휴대전화가 있다면요. 오른손 전용입니다. [#Legal]
For a shiny show-off on the go, go with the phone that’s made of gold. For your Right Hand. [#Legal]
手握黃金手機，隨身炫耀一番。供右手用。[#Legal]
手握黃金手機，隨身炫耀一番。供右手用。[#Legal]
For a shiny show-off on the go, go with the phone that’s made of gold. For your Right Hand. [#Legal]
